entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
